title: 820-3126 no video
message: I recived this iMac with no video. With new working video card no video. 4 leds are on. I checked L9000 and it is ok. Something more I can check on the board?

title: 820-3126 no video
message: All 4 LEDs means the LDC is getting power and there should be an image.

title: 820-3126 no video
message: So, next step is to try with another screen ot lvds cable?

title: 820-3126 no video
message: No, you try an external monitor to make sure there is video.
